title: US Senate Discloses Landmark Crypto Market Structure Bill
summary: The Senate's new draft for a crypto market structure bill outlines regulatory frameworks that could significantly impact the future of Bitcoin and the broader crypto market.

title: Bitcoin Regulation Update SEC 2025 Outlook
